haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Fritz Bernert
Ltn Mario Falck
Uffz Ewald Weinwurm

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 15/05/1916 near Mailly.
A F.E.2b of No 2 Squadron RFC was brought down by Erhard Kesselring of Jasta 4.
2nd Lt Broderick Littlebury was killed in action.
Lt Adrian Marsham was killed in action.
Erhard Kesselring was  flying a Fokker E.III.
